mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 2462) for an order placed by Harold Wells for 500 two color window cards for a performance by Bobby Helms on February 20, The Osbornes on March 18, and Stonewall Jackson on April 3 at The Western Club in Kenosha, Wisconsin. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
